page.title: 09Overcombe and Bowleaze
page.content: { Overcombe and Bowleaze Cove}are both big attractions with holidaymakers.The beach in particular is very popular. Here people swim, water-ski, sail boats, sunbathe and most of all they windsurf. They come from all over the South Coast to participate in this activity. A cafe and ice-cream kiosk can be found in both places.Bowleaze has more holidaymakers,because there are four large caravan parks nearby. Bowleaze also has a play centre, a paddle boat lake,a small train,an amusement arcade and a trampoline. Bowleaze is also the start for walks over the cliffs towards Osmington Near Bowleaze are the remains of a Roman Temple, which can be visited.The hill between Bowleaze and Overcombe is great for flying kites. Paul Herring
